quotes.quote: Harsh words live in the dungeon of the heart.
Harsh reality is always better than false hope.
Sometimes the harshest lessons were the most valuable.
Harshness is for the good of a boy, soft-heartedness will ruin him.
Do not say anything harsh: what you have said will be said back to you.
Love in action is a harsh and dreadful thing compared to love in dreams.
There is no harsher means of punishment, than to answer malice with kindness.
Don't judge anyone harshly until you yourself have been through his experiences
Do not judge yourself harshly. Without mercy for ourselves we cannot love the world.
If you find yourself under lethal attack don't be kind. Be harsh. Be tough. Be ruthless.
Harsh counsels have no effect; they are like hammers, which are always repulsed by the anvil.
The harshest tyranny is that which acts under the protection of legality and the banner of justice.
We set up harsh and unkind rules against ourselves. No one is born without faults. That man is best who has fewest.
Certain souls may seem harsh to others, but it is just a way, beknownst only to them, of caring and feeling more deeply.
Your harshest critic is always going to be yourself. Don't ignore that critic but don't give it more attention than it deserves.
The harshness and choice of words can cut deeply. Republicans need to show compassion and to be reasonable when talking to any ethnic group.
Do not speak harshly to any one; those who are spoken to will answer thee in the same way. Angry speech is painful: blows for blows will touch thee.
There are many harsh lessons to be learned from the gambling experience, but the harshest one of all is the difference between having Fun and being smart.
Be harsh with yourself at times.
It's the intent, not the word, that makes something harsh.
In the harsh face of life faith can read a bracing gospel.
There's a harsh reality - nothing lasts forever. You have to be ready to grow, and grow fast.
It is harsh enough for each man to bear his own wound. But he who leads bears the wounds of all who follow him.
